column4: Hi. I seem to have this recurring problem: my browsers seem to chew up more memory as time goes on, and they grey out (compiz) very often after a few hours. Shutting them down and restarting them again does not fix the issue. Is there something I can use to diagnose the problem?
that's just what browsers do, eat memory! try disabling addons and plugins that you don't use
It doesn't seem to eat it nearly as quickly in Windows XP, though. Do you know why it might be more responsive in Windows and not in Ubuntu?
are we talking about firefox? if so, blame mozilla
